children.subject: Just my two cents, I am talking two conflicting classes and I have to say the experience is not the best. The class you skip the lecture, you end up being behind 90% of the time. The professor never gets to know your name and you end up just hating the class. Maybe my experience is unique in the fact that I usually attend lecture even if it is webcasted because I feel I learn best that way.

history.content:
Hi everyone!

I am a current EECS sophomore, and next semester I was planning to take CS 61C, CS 170, and CS 188. Unfortunately, all 3 of them have the exact same lecture time. Would it be possible to take them all, seeing that they're webcasted, and take some of the finals at a makeup time? If not all 3, would it be possible to take 2 of them?

I've also been thinking about taking CS 160, does anyone know what the class project/platform will be this upcoming semester?

Thank you in advance!
history.subject: Time conflicting classes, course advice
